g.text: Open to the public, RISD's annual Graduate Thesis Exhibition
features work in a wide range of media created by the 194
master's degree candidates graduating on June 1. Each stu
dent showcases a final body of work produced as the culmin
tion of his or her experience in one of RISD's 16 graduate de
partments: Architecture, Ceramics, Digital + Media, Furniture
Design, Glass, Graphic Design, Industrial Design, Interior Archi
Learning in Art + Design, and Textiles.
Open to the public, RISD's annual Graduate Thesis Exhibition
features work in a wide range of media created by the 194
master's degree candidates graduating on June 1. Each stu
dent showcases a final body of work produced as the culmin
tion of his or her experience in one of RISD's 16 graduate de
partments: Architecture, Ceramics, Digital + Media, Furniture
Design, Glass, Graphic Design, Industrial Design, Interior Archi
Learning in Art + Design, and Textiles.
